# f5distributedcloud_global_log_receiver (Resource)

The `f5distributedcloud_global_log_receiver` resource manages Global Log Receivers in F5 Distributed Cloud.

Global Log Receivers enable forwarding of logs from all namespaces to external logging systems.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "f5distributedcloud_global_log_receiver" "example" {
  name           = "global-log-receiver"
  namespace      = "system"
  receiver_type  = "HTTP"
  http_endpoint  = "https://logs.example.com/ingest"
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)
- `receiver_type` (String) Type of log receiver (HTTP, SYSLOG, SPLUNK, DATADOG).

### Optional

- `description` (String)
- `http_endpoint` (String) HTTP endpoint URL for log forwarding.
- `splunk_endpoint` (String) Splunk HEC endpoint URL.
- `splunk_token` (String, Sensitive) Splunk HEC token.
- `syslog_host` (String) Syslog server hostname or IP.
- `syslog_port` (Number) Syslog server port.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
